thread.title: The New Updated Flip PDF Version 4.3.11 Develops More Powerful Functions
thread.title_full: The New Updated Flip PDF Version 4.3.11 Develops More Powerful Functions

author: prbuzz.com
title: The New Updated Flip PDF Version 4.3.11 Develops More Powerful Functions
text:
FlipBuilder is ready to meet user demands with the most recent update to their flip book builder, Flip PDF version 4.3.11.This interactive catalog maker has become the most popular and faster PDF to flipbook sofware .With this release, customers can expect the following updates:
· Optimization of multilingual feature
· Bug repaid for background music in Neat template
· Optimization of UI interface of Share feature on Neat template
· Repair of thumbnail settings within the Flat template
· Responsive background scenes within all templates to correctly fit a variety of screen sizes
· Thumbnail feature for flip books will not load on templates that do not require thumbnail feature.
· Improved appearance of Active template
· Ability to customize the flip book size with Wordpress Plugin
These changes are intended to improve functionality, as well as the overall experience for end-users. In addition to an enhanced experience, these new features will also help to improve the already interactive and engaging flip books that are created and published with this exceptional product.
For those customers that still cannot find the perfect version of this software, Flip PDF provides fully customizable options. Simply share your requirements and FlipBuilder will work with you to create a solution that best fits your needs.
FlipBuilder reminds users that the FlipBuilder platform is the best and most affordable resource for self-publication and distribution of eBooks, online magazines, newsletters, brochures, reports, flyers, catalogues, newspapers, and more.
For more information, visit: http://www.flipbuilder.com
About FlipBuilder
FlipBuilder is a unique, professional digital publishing platform, geared toward providing users the best answer to convert static PDF files into their own web-ready flipbooks. With a focus on simplicity and ease of use, FlipBuilder far surpasses the traditional print publications of the past.
